content.raw:
Looks like a potential race condition here: a few lines above we subscribe to a topic, registering as a callback `OnNewPropagationGrid()`, which will set `this->ReceivedMsg` to `true`.  Assuming that message handling can happen in parallel with this constructor, then this line will overwrite the assignment of `this->ReceivedMsg`, setting it back to `false`.

To avoid this potential problem (and for simplicity), I suggest initializing class members like `isFirst` and `receivedMsg` in the constructor preamble, instead of here in the body.
